botMessages.message: Hi, I’m Sales Bot, a digital assistant. How can I help you today?
Thanks for taking the time to chat!
I'm afraid I didn't understand that.
Look’s like no one is available right now.
Sure! First, what are you inquring about?
Alright. I'm happy to connect you with our Sales team.
Unfortunately, a system error occurred. I'll connect you to an agent who can help.
Sure! In a few words, please describe what you want to learn more about?
Alright. Our product experts will be happy to answer your questions.

botDialogs.label: Learn About Our Company and Products

botMessages.message: What's your work email address?
What's your first name ?
What's your last name ?
Can I assist you with anything else?

botQuickReplyOptions.literalValue: Yes - Take me back to the Main Menu
No - I'm all set for now

botMessages.message: Invalid Email Verification Code.
Would you like to use a different email address or resend verification code?
We don’t want to keep you waiting. Let’s schedule a meeting with your Account Executive.
Click the following link to schedule a meeting with your Account Executive : {!Meeting_Link}
What day and time works best for you?
Someone from our team will reach out to you soon.
It looks like you're with {!Account_Name}. Is that correct?
OK. Which company are you working with?
